review: I absolutely love the Fire TV Stick.  Actually, I now have 3 of them.  They were very easy to set up and are very easy to use.  Prior to owning these sticks, I would frequently not be able to access movies through the Smart TV's amazon app.  Nothing would load, which was extremely frustrating. I do not have that problem with the Fire TV Sticks.  Everything I have wanted to watch has loaded quickly and the picture quality has been great.  I did not purchase the voice remote, because if I want to use the voice feature I can use the Fire TV apps that I have installed on my iphone and my Kindle Fire tablet.  They work great.  Most of the time I don't even use those, because the remote that was included with the stick is more than adequate.  I am a prime member, so I am able to access a lot of television shows and movies for free, which makes the Fire TV Stick that much more awesome.  All in all, I think these are great streaming devices and I am so glad I purchased them.
author: Deborah L. Muni

review: When I signed up and for the stick I was led to believe there would be many movies and TV series included in my prime membership. I have used Prime for discounts and shipping and will continue my membership for that reason but I am disappointed in some aspects of the movies and TV. I do not like many of the movies coming out of Hollywood today because all they are is a race to see who can get their clothed off the fastest and who can blow up the most sets. I like the older movies from the 30's to the 50's but when I click on most of those that prime offers I have to either buy or rent. I would like to see more movies and series available on prime that are part of my membership that I do not have to pay extra for such as the British mysteries like Lewis the entire series, Morse the entire series, Frost the entire series, and the old movies that I do not have to pay extra for. If what it would take is a little more money I would be willing to pay $120 per year instead or $99 but I want in return not to have to see that I have to rent or buy the movies I want.
